text:
放棄求助道具並繼續
全世界水域中游著將近40種海豚。 牠們是包含逆戟鯨和小鯨魚之鯨魚家族的一員。 海豚有兩個胃，第一個存放食物，第二個則是消化食物之處。 牠們的背鰭都是獨一無二的，這也是牠們識別彼此的方式！

trans:
Give up the help tool and continue
There are nearly 40 species of dolphins swimming in waters around the world. They are members of the whale family, which includes orcas and porpoises. Dolphins have two stomachs: the first stores food, and the second is where food is digested. Their dorsal fins are unique, which is how they identify each other!
